main.Query:
Declare @vchSQL varchar(8000) Declare @bigsql varchar(8000)
set @vchSQL = 'use [' + @DBName + '] /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[usp_GetDimECEntity] Script Date: 07/03/2012 13:06:16 ******/ IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N''[dbo].[usp_GetDimECEntity]'') AND type in (N''P'', N''PC'')) DROP PROCEDURE [dbo].[usp_GetDimECEntity] ' exec (@vchSQL)
set @vchSQL ='CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[usp_GetDimECEntity] @DimPoolId bigint, @DimECID bigint
AS
BEGIN
SET NOCOUNT ON
select * from dbo.tblDimEC where DimPoolId = @DimPoolId and DimECID = @DimECID
END ' SET @BigSQL = 'USE [' + @DBName + ']; EXEC sp_executesql N''' + @vchSQL + ''''; EXEC (@BigSQL)
